abstract: A raid of BP office’s in Moscow underscored the uncertain nature of dealing with state-run companies.
snippet: A raid of BP office’s in Moscow underscored the uncertain nature of dealing with state-run companies.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — Exxon Mobil, welcome to the world of the “masky show.”

headline.main: Memo to Exxon: Business With Russia Might Involve Guns and Balaclavas
headline.print_headline: Memo to Exxon: Business With Russia Might Involve Guns and Balaclavas
